interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.TargetTemperature
interface.description: This interface is for setting target temperature(s) of the HAE devices such as air conditioner, refrigerator, oven, etc.

struct.name: SetPoint
struct.description: The structure that holds a current setpoints target falue as well as the allowable range and granualrity of that range

property.name: TargetTemperatureCooling
property.description: Set point that the device is attempting to keep temperature below (cooling)

property.name: TargetTemperatureHeating
property.description: Set point that the device is attempting to keep temperature above

method.name: SetTargetTemperatureCooling
method.description: Set target temperatures for cooling set point

method.name: SetTargetTemperatureHeating
method.description: Set target temperatures for heating set point
